hypothesis_content.title: Dominance Breakdown After 60% Psychological Level
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC dominance breaks below the 60% level (current: ~60% per news) on a weekly closing basis while ETH/BTC ratio shows 3 consecutive higher lows, it will trigger accelerated altcoin rotation causing 5%+ further dominance decline over next 10 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: 60% dominance is a key psychological and technical level. Breakdown below this level, especially with ETH leadership and altcoin volume confirmation, often triggers momentum selling of BTC dominance as 'alt season' narratives gain traction.
entry_conditions: ETH/BTC ratio has 3 consecutive higher daily lows
Altcoin market cap/BTC market cap ratio 5-day SMA turns upward

exit_conditions.take_profit: BTC dominance declines 5% from entry level
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC dominance reclaims 60% level with weekly close above

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If BTC dominance quickly reclaims 60% level with strong volume, indicating failed breakdown and continued BTC leadership.
